Pre-Game Insights: India, with two impressive wins in two games, are high on momentum and confidence.
India are determined to secure their place in the semi-finals by topping Group 1.
A significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry fuels India's confidence.
The Aussies boast a winning mentality in ICC white-ball tournaments.
AUS has a marginal advantage in AUSvIND matchups in ICC white-ball competitions (12-10).
Miscellaneous Highlights: A classic AUSvIND battle is expected.
Jasprit Bumrah is expected to torment the Aussie top-order.
A sold-out Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium will host the match.
The match is a must-win for India to top Group 1 and secure a semi-final berth.
Others: The match will be played on Monday, June 24, 2024, at 8 pm IST at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in St Lucia.
The squads for both teams have been announced.
The article mentions the head-to-head statistics between India and Australia in T20Is.
